author: GameSpot
description:
Lucy James and Jeff Grubb speculate about what may pop up at a Nintendo Direct tomorrow (03/26/25). Will we see Metroid Prime 4? Hollow Knight: Silksong? Or potentially some long forgotten series gets brought back to the Switch 1? Let's try and crack what Nintendo has in store before the Switch 2 Direct next week.

0:00 - A Nintendo Direct Drops Tomorrow!
4:47 - The Switch's Last Hurrah?
6:15 - Metroid Prime 4?
12:10 - Fire Emblem?
15:10 - Any Third Party Games Coming?
18:01 - Game Informer Returns
21:05 - What Is GameStop Up To?
25:57 - Assassin's Creed Shadows Ratios Elon Musk
30:30 - Mortal Kombat Talk
37:15 - No Witcher 4 Until 2027?
41:08 - CD Projekt Has Signed A Deal With Pokemon Go Owner Scopely
43:56 - Monster Hunter Wilds Details
48:28 - PlayStation Plus Games Announced
50:00 - Poll Question

#nintendo #nintendoswitch #nintendodirect #samus #metroidprime #metroidprime4 #hollowknight
title: A Nintendo Direct Drops Tomorrow! | Game Breaking news

author: GameSpot
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows RATIOS Elon Musk

author: GameSpot
description:
Jean-Luc and Kurt play Half-Life 2 RTX.

Gather round, folks. Tonight is the night you witness Kurt and Jean-Luc break their table while playing the free demo Half-Life 2 RTX, and marvel at the cheeks of a zombie on a fence. The graphics are just too powerful! On the topic of visuals, can you spot the difference between the original and the RTX update? 

0:00 - Reacting to Half-Life 2 RTX
0:28 - What is Half-Life 2 RTX?
2:18 - Playing Half-Life 2 RTX
08:10 - The Table Incident
10:34 - Marveling At The Cheeks
12:35 - Jim Carrey In The Mask?
18:12 - How Jean-Luc And Kurt Got Into Half-Life
21:30 - Kurt Shows Jean-Luc How It's Done!

#halflife #halflife2 #halflife2rtx
title: Look At Those RTX Butt Cheeks In Half-Life 2 RTX

author: GameSpot
title: SPLIT FICTION Development vs Final Gameplay

title: This Arcade Psychedelic First-Person Shooter Is Inspired By Spiritualism

author: GameSpot
description:
GameSpot and Giant Bomb are teaming up for The Power Block, an all day livestream featuring breaking news, coverage on the latest games, let's plays, and more!

Schedule (Times listed in PST)
Slot 1: GameBreaking News - 9am
Slot 2: Blight Club - 10am
Slot 3: The First Berserker: Khazan - 12pm
title: 🔴LIVE! GameBreaking News, The First Berserker: Khazan, NEW Season of Blight Club | POWER BLOCK 03/26
